name: LivingHealEvent
description: LivingHealEvent is fired when an Entity is set to be healed. This event is fired whenever an Entity is healed in EntityLivingBase#heal(float) This event is fired via the ForgeHooks#onLivingHeal(EntityLivingBase, float) . amount contains the amount of healing done to the Entity that was healed. This event is Cancelable . If this event is canceled, the Entity is not healed. This event does not have a result. HasResult This event is fired on the MinecraftForge#EVENT_BUS .
